no_of_t=raw_input()
no_of_t=int(no_of_t)
while(no_of_t>0):
    no_of_t-=1
    n=raw_input()
    n=int(n)
    
    list_of_num=raw_input().split()
    for i in range(0,n):
        list_of_num[i]=int(list_of_num[i])
    
    num=None
    num_count=0
    
    for no in list_of_num:
        count=0
        for x in list_of_num:
            if no==x:
                count+=1
        if count>num_count:
            num=no
            num_count=count
        if count==num_count:
            if no<num:
                num=no
                num_count=count
    print num,num_count
